Tables

Simple CSS for HTML tables.

Examples

Default

Table headingTable headingTable headingTable heading
Table cellTable cellTable cellTable cell
Table cellTable cellTable cellTable cell
Table cellTable cellTable cellTable cell
<table class='table'>
  <thead>
    <tr>
      <th>Table heading</th>
      <th>Table heading</th>
      <th>Table heading</th>
      <th>Table heading</th>
    </tr>
  </thead>
  <tbody>
    <tr>
      <td>Table cell</td>
      <td>Table cell</td>
      <td>Table cell</td>
      <td>Table cell</td>
    </tr>
    ...
  </tbody>
</table>

  <thead>
    <tr>
      <th>Table heading</th>
      <th>Table heading</th>
      <th>Table heading</th>
      <th>Table heading</th>
    </tr>
  </thead>
  <tbody>
    <tr>
      <td>Table cell</td>
      <td>Table cell</td>
      <td>Table cell</td>
      <td>Table cell</td>
    </tr>
    ...
  </tbody>
</table>
